metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17531 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
gozilla.c in GNU GLOBAL 4.8.6 does not validate strings before launchingthe program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which mightallow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a craftedURL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

global - 6.6.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: global package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.2-1').
